description: This file defines a custom toolkit class for customer database operations, creates an agent with specific tools, and runs an asynchronous response printing method.

classes.name: CustomerDBTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for customer database operations, including retrieving and deleting customer profiles.

methods.name: retrieve_customer_profile
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a customer profile from the database and returns it as a JSON string.

methods.name: delete_customer_profile
methods.description: Deletes a customer profile from the database and returns a confirmation string.
